events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me well and I am not satisfied with the product.
The customer's message contains keywords related to refund; the issue is categorized under Refund.
Assigning the case to agent Lisa for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the date you received the jacket so I can process your refund?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and I received the jacket three days ago on June 12th.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. If you have any other questions, please feel free to ask.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if everything is now satisfactory with your order.
I received the refund today and everything looks good. Thank you again for your support.
Closing this case as the refund has been confirmed received and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is valuable.
